Package io.github.eutro.wasm2j.core.conf.itf

Class WirJavaConventionFactory.Builder

java.lang.Object
io.github.eutro.wasm2j.core.conf.itf.WirJavaConventionFactory.Builder
Enclosing interface:
WirJavaConventionFactory
public static class WirJavaConventionFactory.Builder extends Object
A builder for a (configurable) default WirJavaConventionFactory.

The conventions used will generally assume that each local function will be implemented as a Java method, each local global as a Java field, each local memory as a Java ByteBuffer, and each local table as a Java array.

Imports and exports, however, are much more flexible, and are highly configurable through this builder.

      public WirJavaConventionFactory.Builder setCallingConvention(CallingConvention callingConvention)

    • setNameSupplier

      public WirJavaConventionFactory.Builder setNameSupplier(Supplier<String> nameSupplier)
      Set the function that generates class names. Class names must be internal names. That is, package names should be separated by slashes (/) and not periods (.).
      Parameters:
      nameSupplier - The function that supplies names.
      Returns:
      This builder, for convenience.

    • addConstructorCallback

      public WirJavaConventionFactory.Builder addConstructorCallback(ConstructorCallback cb)
      Add a callback that should be run to modify the constructor.

      These callbacks are run in order that they were added, and after those for funcs, globals, tables, and memories.

      Parameters:
      cb - The callback to add.
      Returns:
      This builder, for convenience.

    • build

      public WirJavaConventionFactory build()
      Create the WirJavaConventionFactory this builder defines.

      Note: this builder must not be reused after.

      Returns:
      The convention factory.
